long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the age of safety recalls, this is a cool chrome extension. RecallPro is a Chrome extension that checks if any products listed for sale on any website have a recall issued against them by the Consumer Protection and Safety Commission. The extension works by hi-lighting a selection and then clicking on the "RecallPro This" context menu item.
